label: Ash — 6 Feb — I'll run the Email Agent task. Let me start by setting up th

turns.text:
[cron:07e01ecf-5d6b-42c5-ac77-6396be442596 Email Agent - Check and respond] You are the Email Agent. Check the inbox and respond to emails using the amail CLI tool.

**Setup (run first):**
```bash
# Start hydroxide if not running
if ! pgrep -f "hydroxide.*serve" > /dev/null; then
  nohup ~/go/bin/hydroxide -disable-carddav serve > /tmp/hydroxide.log 2>&1 &
  sleep 3
fi

# Ensure amail is available
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
if [ ! -f ~/.local/bin/amail ]; then
  ~/.local/bin/gh repo clone ash-openclaw/amail-cli /tmp/amail-cli
  cp /tmp/amail-cli/amail ~/.local/bin/
  chmod +x ~/.local/bin/amail
fi
```

**Main task:**
1. Check unread: `amail list`
2. For each unread email:
   - Read: `amail read --id <ID>`
   - Generate contextual reply
   - Reply: `amail reply --id <ID> --body "<reply>" --mark-read`
3. Report summary to Discord using message tool

Credentials are in /data/workspace/.env.email - amail reads them automatically.
Current time: Friday, February 6th, 2026 — 4:59 AM (UTC)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.
I'll run the Email Agent task. Let me start by setting up the environment and checking for unread emails.

args.command:
if ! pgrep -f "hydroxide.*serve" > /dev/null; then
  nohup ~/go/bin/hydroxide -disable-carddav serve > /tmp/hydroxide.log 2>&1 &
  sleep 3
fi
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
if [ ! -f ~/.local/bin/amail ]; then
  ~/.local/bin/gh repo clone ash-openclaw/amail-cli /tmp/amail-cli
  cp /tmp/amail-cli/amail ~/.local/bin/
  chmod +x ~/.local/bin/amail
fi
echo "Setup complete"
